body_html: The problem here is that torch.nn is calling SpatialDepthWiseConvolution that was removed https://github.com/torch/nn/blob/master/SpatialDepthWiseConvolution.lua#L80. torch.nn has to be fixed to call SpatialDepthwiseConvolution routines.
body_text: The problem here is that torch.nn is calling SpatialDepthWiseConvolution that was removed https://github.com/torch/nn/blob/master/SpatialDepthWiseConvolution.lua#L80. torch.nn has to be fixed to call SpatialDepthwiseConvolution routines.
body: The problem here is that torch.nn is calling SpatialDepth**W**iseConvolution that was removed https://github.com/torch/nn/blob/master/SpatialDepthWiseConvolution.lua#L80. torch.nn has to be fixed to call SpatialDepth**w**iseConvolution routines.
